Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is partially grey-black in section, the interior is encrusted with a glossy yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of six lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394817) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394817)
